snippet: Some of the payment service’s users said the company needlessly froze their accounts when large transactions were involved.
abstract: Some users of online payment service PayPal say the company needlessly freezes their accounts when large transactions are involved; some businesses who are frustrated by the company's aggressive antifraud measures are looking at other ways to accept payments.
lead_paragraph: Some of the payment service’s users said the company needlessly froze their accounts when large transactions were involved.

headline.seo: PayPal Antifraud Measures Are Extreme, Some Users Say
headline.main: Some PayPal Users Criticize Antifraud Measures
headline.print_headline: Some PayPal Users, Frozen Out, Criticize Antifraud Measures
